title: nathajana paripaala
sahitya:
natajana paripAla ghana nannu brOvavE



anupallavi



 shruti moraliDa lEd bhU-sUtradhAri vIvE gadA



caraNam



 jita manOrathulaku mauna yatula tapO niyatulakai hitamu sEyaka hitapu vratalanu jEndina 

shrta padambu jIvanAmrta phalambu nIvani nA hitamu pUja viDa nADina ataDE tyAgarAjanuta
